citations.narrative:
The facility had update ID tags and acquired new chain collar material, however at least 17 dogs were observed to not
have their ID tags. The licensee said that the new material has been breaking. Lack of ID tags can make tracking
husbandry and health conditions of each dog difficult. Ensure to obrtain and affix ID's with a collar made of material
generally considered acceptable to pet owners as a means of identifying their pet dogs.

The facility APHIS 7005 has not been updated to reflect 5 new adult dogs in the kennel. APHIS 7005 must be maintained
up to date to reflect the animals that are in the facility and can be important if animal tracking needs to be done. Ensure to
update APHIS 7005 with all current animal information and maintain it at all times to reflect animals on hand.
***Correct by June 28, 2023.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Indoor areas were clean and the majority of outdoor runs were clean, however 2 outdoor runs on the west side of the
building had more than one day's amount of waste material on the floor. Lack of daily spot cleaning of dog waste can
increase disease and pest hazards for the dogs. Ensure to make daily removal of waste in areas that dogs can contact it
(including outdoor runs) part of the daily chore routine.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.50  Repeat
   
Time and method of identification. 
The facility had update ID tags and acquired new chain collar material, however at least 17 dogs were observed to not 
have their ID tags. The licensee said that the new material has been breaking. Lack of ID tags can make tracking 
husbandry and health conditions of each dog difficult. Ensure to obrtain and affix ID's with a collar made of material 
generally considered acceptable to pet owners as a means of identifying their pet dogs. 
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility APHIS 7005 has not been updated to reflect 5 new adult dogs in the kennel. APHIS 7005 must be maintained 
up to date to reflect the animals that are in the facility and can be important if animal tracking needs to be done. Ensure to 
update APHIS 7005 with all current animal information and maintain it at all times to reflect animals on hand.  
***Correct by June 28, 2023. 
3.11(a)  Repeat
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Indoor areas were clean and the majority of outdoor runs were clean, however 2 outdoor runs on the west side of the 
building had more than one day's amount of waste material on the floor. Lack of daily spot cleaning of dog waste can 
increase disease and pest hazards for the dogs. Ensure to make daily removal of waste in areas that dogs can contact it 
(including outdoor runs) part of the daily chore routine. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
